translations: 男皮条客；<澳新，非正式>告发者，告密者
拉皮条；<非正式>使（某物）更炫（或更令人难忘）；<非正式>盛大（或持续）推售（某事物）；<澳新，非正式>告发，告密（pimp on）

sentences.sentence: Many of these pimps are on sale to the highest bidder.
sentences.translation: 这种眼线很多都是把自己卖给价钱出得最高的人的。

sentences.sentence: One of the most vexing questions people have is why teenage girls don't run away more often from pimps who assault them and extract all the money they earn.
sentences.translation: 人们最感到恼火的其中一点就是为什么那些少女不更努力的逃离那些殴打她们，压榨她们每一分钱的皮条客。

sentences.sentence: Bruce Willis: Andreas Thompson once said to me the movie business is a cruel and shallow money change thieves and pimps went free and good men die like dogs.
sentences.translation: 布鲁斯·威利斯：安德烈·汤普森有一次对我说电影行业是一个残酷而又浅薄的金钱游戏小偷和皮条客横行好人象狗一样死去。
